name: entrust IT
description: entrustIT was created in 2006 to address the IT needs of small & medium sized businesses (SMEs) and not-for-profit organisations (NFPs). Although we focus primarily on cloud based IT products and services, we have a large portfolio of clients who rely on us to care for their traditional, on premise, IT too. We provide our products and services direct to SMEs/NFPs and also via a network of reseller partners both in the UK and abroad.
